atk_abil: Normal Attack: Swiftly swings his sword, unleashing 6 consecutive attacks. Creates a sand storm when attacking, dealing damage to multiple enemies and knocking them back.

Skill Attack: Hurls a pile of rough desert sand at multiple enemies, dealing damage with a certain chance of blinding them. Blinded enemies cannot attack temporarily. (If stealth is deactivated, the skill is immediately cast.)
Special Ability 1: Increases basic speed of the game by 5%, increases human movement speed by 3% and attack distance by 4%.
Special Ability 2: Never gets disturbed by the terrain of Stage 10,000 or higher.
Special Ability 3: Appears near the enemies at its first appearance, and casts a buff to increase the its own movement speed and attack speed.
Special Ability 4: Cloaks itself to stealthily infiltrate the enemy base to destroy it.
Special Ability 5: Chance to instantly cast abilities when taking damage.
Innervate 3: Decreases cooldown of Guild Invasion skills even if Sindbad is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 3%).
Battle Cry (Human): Increases the attack, defense and HP of human units in Guild Invasion even if Sindbad is in the Time Shop (5-star 1%, 6-star 2.5%, Max 30%).
